message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this amazing product! I think you'll really love it. I'm willing to sell it to you for $10,500. It's a great deal, if I do say so myself.
Alice, thanks for the offer! I appreciate you being willing to work with me.  However,  $10,500 is a bit higher than I'm comfortable paying right now.  Would you be willing to come down to $9,500?

Hi Bob, I understand that $10,500 is a bit high for you, but I'm not willing to go all the way down to $9,500. I'm willing to meet you halfway and offer you the product for $10,000. It's still a great deal, and I think you'll be happy with the price.
